title: TRANSFORMERS.Rise.of.the.Dark.Spark.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

Game Information:  
:
Transformers: Rise Of The Dark Spark connects universes Cybertron
Transformers series and movies directed by Michael Bay (Michael Bay).
The project will be 40 playable characters. You have to hunt for a powerful
artifact Dark Spark. During the passage of a single campaign for the
Autobots or Decepticons you can switch between the characters.
Transformers: Rise Of The Dark Spark will offer dynamic battle in
large-scale co-op mode konfliktah.Budet present escalation (Escalation)
for 4 people. It is necessary to withstand the waves of enemies.
It added more improved protection and characters. In Transformers:
Rise Of The Dark Spark has a single development system for multiplayer
and single player. As you progress you will unlock new characters,
weapons, special abilities and bonuses.

Game Features:  

More than 40 characters from two different universes!

Transformed when necessary: Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Easily switch between robot and art forms!
Fight on Earth and Cybertron in an unforgettable battle for dark spark.

Epic network battles: Advanced network mode of passing a joint to 4
players, "Escalation" with new, improve the defensive fortifications
and dangerous powerful enemies!

The new system rewards: Levels can also be obtained in the campaign
and escalations, allowing the player to receive the award, which will
help in the passage of all modes!


Repack Features:  
TRANSFORMERS - Rise of the Dark Spark
Based on release from PLAZA
Version of the game - the last on 17.07.2014
Do not cut / recoded

Additions:
